title: User Registration with Valid Data
description: Verify that a user can successfully register with valid and complete registration data.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page.
Input valid user details including username, email, and password.
Submit the registration form.
Verify that the registration was successful and a confirmation message is shown.

title: User Registration with Missing Required Fields
description: Ensure the system handles missing required registration fields correctly by showing appropriate validation errors.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page.
Enter incomplete registration details, leaving mandatory fields empty.
Submit the registration form.
Check that error messages are displayed indicating the missing required fields.

title: User Login with Correct Credentials
description: Verify that a user can successfully log in with valid credentials and that JWT and cookies are correctly set.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Input valid username/email and password.
Click on the login button.
Verify that login is successful and JWT token is received with session cookies properly set.

title: User Login with Invalid Credentials
description: Check that login fails when the user enters incorrect username or password and proper error messages are displayed.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Input incorrect username/email or password.
Click on the login button.
Verify that login fails and an appropriate error message is shown.

title: Add WhatsApp Session via QR Code
description: Ensure that a user can add a WhatsApp session by scanning the QR code and that the system establishes the session correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to the WhatsApp session management page.
Display the session QR code.
Scan the QR code using the WhatsApp mobile application.
Verify that the WhatsApp session establishes successfully and is linked to the user account.

title: Fail to Establish WhatsApp Session on Invalid QR Code
description: Validate that the system correctly handles the case when an invalid QR code is scanned and session establishment fails.

steps.description: Attempt to connect WhatsApp session using an invalid or expired QR code.
Verify that the session connection fails and an error notification is shown.

title: Set User Location Manually
description: Verify the user can manually select their country and location is saved and reflected correctly in user settings.

steps.description: Navigate to user settings.
Select a country from the manual location dropdown.
Save the new location.
Verify the location setting is saved and used for reminder scheduling.

title: Set User Location Automatically
description: Confirm that the system can automatically set user location using available data and update settings accordingly.

steps.description: Navigate to user settings.
Enable automatic location detection.
Verify that the location is detected automatically and saved in user settings.

title: Configure Morning and Evening Adhkar Reminders
description: Verify user can enable and configure morning and evening Adhkar reminders with preferred timings.

steps.description: Navigate to reminder configuration page.
Enable morning Adhkar reminder and set the time.
Enable evening Adhkar reminder and set the time.
Save reminder settings.
Verify that the reminders are saved and scheduled according to the set times.

title: Add Custom Islamic Reminder with Invalid Time
description: Validate that the system rejects custom reminder creation when invalid time formats are provided.

steps.description: Navigate to custom reminder creation.
Enter reminder details with invalid time format.
Attempt to save the reminder.
Verify that an error message is shown and reminder is not saved.

title: Send Islamic Reminder via WhatsApp
description: Verify that scheduled Islamic reminders (Adhkar, fasting) are sent correctly via WhatsApp at configured times.

steps.description: Ensure WhatsApp session is active.
Configure a reminder schedule for a near future time.
Confirm the reminder message is delivered on WhatsApp at the scheduled time.

title: Handle Reminder Sending Failure due to WhatsApp Session Lost
description: Ensure the system correctly logs and handles errors occurring when reminders fail to send due to WhatsApp session disconnection.

steps.description: Invalidate the WhatsApp session.
Trigger the sending of a scheduled reminder.
Verify that reminder sending fails gracefully and the error is logged.

title: Admin Dashboard User Listing and Search
description: Check that admin can view, search, and paginate through the list of users in the admin dashboard.

steps.description: Login as admin.
Navigate to user management section.
Search for users with specific criteria.
Verify the user list updates according to search and pagination works correctly.

title: Admin Modify User Subscription Plan
description: Ensure admin can update a user's subscription plan and the change is reflected immediately.

steps.description: Navigate to a user's profile in admin dashboard.
Change the subscription plan.
Save the changes.
Verify the new subscription plan is applied successfully to the user.

title: Payment Processing Success for Subscription
description: Verify that payment for a subscription plan is processed successfully and user subscription is activated.

steps.description: Select a subscription plan for purchase.
Complete the payment using valid payment details.
Confirm payment success and subscription activation.

title: Payment Processing Failure with Invalid Payment Details
description: Ensure payment fails appropriately when invalid or declined payment details are used and user is notified.

steps.description: Select a subscription plan for purchase.
Enter invalid or declined payment details.
Attempt to complete the payment.
Verify that payment is rejected with a clear error message and subscription is not activated.

title: Content Services Return Hadith Data Correctly
description: Verify that the content management service fetches and returns Hadith content as expected.

steps.description: Request Hadith content via content service API.
Verify that Hadith content is returned correctly and contains valid data.

title: Audit Logging Records User Activities
description: Verify that user activities such as login, subscription changes, and reminder updates are recorded in audit logs.

steps.description: Perform a user login.
Change user reminder settings.
Update subscription details.
Verify that all actions are recorded in the audit logs with correct timestamps and user identifiers.

title: User Settings Persistence across Sessions
description: Ensure that changes to user settings including location and reminder preferences persist after logout and login.

steps.description: Login and modify user settings including location and reminders.
Logout from the system.
Login again with the same user.
Confirm that all previously configured settings are retained and correctly loaded.

title: Handle Invalid JWT Tokens on Secured Endpoints
description: Ensure the system properly rejects requests with invalid or expired JWT tokens and returns appropriate errors.

steps.description: Attempt to access secured endpoints with an invalid or expired JWT token.
Verify access is denied and an authentication error is returned.
